Our Mission

The beauty industry is overwhelming. With thousands of products launched every year, conflicting reviews, and marketing noise, finding products that truly work can feel impossible.

That's where GlowPicked comes in. We use AI tools to research Amazon's most popular and highest-rated products, then present them in a clear, honest format so you can make informed decisions.

How We Work

We use AI tools to help us research products. Here's our honest process:

üî¨

Product Research

We use AI tools to research popular products in each category on Amazon, looking at ratings, review volume, and what customers commonly say about them.

üìä

Review Research

We read through Amazon customer reviews to identify common themes ‚Äî what people love, what they complain about, and who the product works best for. We don't have a fake-review filter or sentiment algorithm.

üèÜ

Selection

We pick 3 budget-friendly and 3 luxury products per category based on high ratings, large review counts, and consistently positive feedback. There's no algorithm ‚Äî it's research and editorial judgment.

üí°

Honest Presentation

We present pros, cons, and the product's Amazon rating. We don't track your preferences or personalize recommendations. What you see is the same for everyone.

What Makes Us Different

üö´

No Bias, Just Data

Unlike traditional reviewers who might be influenced by brand relationships, we pick products based on customer reviews, not brand relationships. But we're human (well, AI-assisted human) ‚Äî we do our best to be objective.

‚ö°

Periodic Updates

We update our recommendations periodically, not in real-time. Products and reviews change ‚Äî we do our best to keep things current but can't guarantee real-time accuracy.

üîç

Comprehensive Coverage

We focus on products available on Amazon with enough reviews to be meaningful. We may miss great products that are new, niche, or sold elsewhere.

üéØ

Context-Aware Reviews

We try to note which skin types each product suits best, based on what reviewers say. But everyone's skin is different ‚Äî what works for most may not work for you.

Who We Are

GlowPicked is an independent review site run by a small team using AI tools. We research Amazon products and present honest recommendations. We don't physically test products and we don't have a lab or research team.

AI-Assisted Research

We use AI tools (like Claude and Grok) to help us research products, write content, and organize information. The AI helps, but a human makes final decisions.

Review-Based Approach

We base our picks primarily on Amazon customer reviews ‚Äî ratings, review counts, and what real buyers say. We don't cross-reference scientific databases.

Transparency First

We're upfront about what we are: a small team using AI tools to research Amazon products. We don't test products, we don't have algorithms, and we earn money through affiliate links.

Transparency & Trust

How We Make Money

We earn commissions when you purchase products through our affiliate links. We try not to let this influence our picks, but we want you to know about it. We clearly disclose all affiliate relationships.

Our AI's Limitations

Our research is based on publicly available Amazon reviews. We can't replace professional dermatological advice, and individual results will vary. Always patch-test new products and consult a dermatologist for serious skin concerns.

Data Privacy

We take your privacy seriously. We don't sell personal data, and we use aggregated, anonymized information to improve our recommendations. See our Privacy Policy for details.

The Future of Beauty Intelligence

We're just getting started. Our roadmap includes personalized skincare routines, virtual try-on technology, ingredient interaction analysis, and partnerships with beauty brands to create truly effective products based on our research.

We believe the future of beauty is intelligent, personalized, and transparent. Join us as we transform how the world discovers and experiences beauty products.
